intro.title: Introduction
intro.p1: MyAgentWebsite.com ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.
intro.p2: Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site or use our services.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.intro: We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:
items: Register for an account and access our backoffice
Create and manage property listings
Upload photos to your photo library
Subscribe to newsletter services
Fill out contact forms or request demos
Use our API for custom integrations
Communicate with us via email or support channels
typesList: Name, email address, and phone number
Real estate agency name and business information
Property listing data (addresses, descriptions, prices, photos)
Client testimonials and reviews you choose to display
Profile information, preferences, and account settings

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Information
automatic.intro: When you visit our website, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including:
items: IP address
Browser type and version
Operating system
Pages visited and time spent on pages
Referring website addresses
Device information

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
items: Providing, operating, and maintaining our real estate website platform and API
Managing your backoffice access and property listings
Storing and organizing your photo library
Managing newsletter subscribers and enabling CSV exports
Generating preview mode links for quality control
Processing your transactions and managing your subscription
Responding to inquiries and providing priority or email support
Hosting and maintaining your website (Professional plan)
Sending administrative emails, security updates, and service notifications
Improving our platform, backoffice, and API services
Analyzing usage patterns to enhance features
Detecting and preventing fraud, abuse, and unauthorized access
Complying with legal obligations and data protection regulations

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device.

items.name: Essential Cookies
items.desc: Required for the website to function properly

items.name: Analytics Cookies
items.desc: Help us understand how visitors use our website

cookies.control: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our service.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: We use third-party service providers to help us operate our platform and deliver our services. These third parties include:

services.name: Stripe
services.purpose: Secure payment processing for subscriptions and one-time services

services.name: Railway / Vercel
services.purpose: Cloud hosting for backend API and frontend applications

services.name: Cloudflare
services.purpose: Content delivery network (CDN), DNS management, and security

services.name: Image Hosting Services
services.purpose: Storing and optimizing property photos in your photo library

services.name: Email Service Providers
services.purpose: Sending transactional emails, password resets, and notifications

services.name: Analytics Services
services.purpose: Understanding website usage to improve our platform

thirdParty.note: These third parties have access to your information only to perform specific tasks on our behalf and are contractually obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose. We carefully vet all third-party providers to ensure they meet our security and privacy standards.

security.title: Data Security
security.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:
measures: SSL/TLS encryption (HTTPS) for all data transmission
Secure authentication and password hashing for backoffice access
API key authentication for developer integrations
Secure token generation for preview mode links with time-based expiration
Secure file storage for photos and media in your photo library
Regular backups and disaster recovery procedures
Employee and contractor training on data protection and privacy
security.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. We recommend using strong passwords and not sharing your backoffice credentials.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. Property listings, photos in your photo library, and content you create remain available while your subscription is active. Newsletter subscriber data is retained until you request deletion or export it. After account cancellation, we retain certain information for legal and tax purposes (typically 7 years for financial records). Backups may retain data for up to 90 days. You can request deletion of your data at any time by contacting us, subject to our legal obligations.

rights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
rights.intro: If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights:

items.name: Right to Access
items.desc: Request copies of your personal data

items.name: Right to Erasure
items.desc: Request deletion of your personal data

items.name: Right to Object
items.desc: Object to processing of your data

rights.exercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at the email address provided below.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and maintained on servers located outside of your country where data protection laws may differ. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable laws.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, want to exercise your data rights, or have concerns about our data practices, please contact us:
